title: Jabra brings multipoint Bluetooth and Google Assistant to Elite 7 Pro and Active
content:
The Elite 7 Pro and Elite 7 Active earbuds has seemed to be the black sheep of Jabra’s line â€“ the only pair of true wireless earbuds without multipoint pairing. Fortunately, Jabra is finally bringing the feature to these earbuds via an OTA update.

more…

The post Jabra brings multipoint Bluetooth and Google Assistant to Elite 7 Pro and Active appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The latest update to the Jabra Elite 7 Pro and Active earbuds brings multipoint pairing and Google Assistant.
